channel.title: I am making my first server im done except for compiling help me!
channel.description:
ok so im working on my server and im done except for my compiling i cant get it to compile when i try to compile i get this error
[code]Server should be done in a few seconds,please wait. javac: file not found: *.java usage: <options> <source codes> use -help for possible options. press any key to continue... [/code]
the compile code i am using is
[code]@echo off COLOR 09 title DePredaTe's Compiler. echo Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
and the run.bat code i am using is
[code]@echo off COLOR 09 title Devolutionv7 Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
im using windows VISTA
AND my jdk is jdk1.6.0_05 so if u can help me post or personel message me
i have been trying for weeks and in the past 2 days i have spent 17 HOURS tryign to do this PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!!! :( :( :( :( :( :( :(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:(:

item.source: I am making my first server im done except for compiling help me!

item.title: I am making my first server im done except for compiling help me!
item.dc:creator: @projectpkerz projectpkerz
item.description:
@projectpkerz wrote:

try this
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

Listen, You’ve made changes right? Ok, If you did. Search for the thing you changed.

Say i made changes too client.java and i edited a command.

Ctrl + F and type in the name of the command. if it doesnt pop up… I have no clue, I dont have vista but i know in order too do java with vista you have to do something.
